title: Test writing to theme color palette
description:
We proved we can READ the theme palette (colorScheme.colors) and SET elements to use theme references ({themeColor: "ACCENT1"}).

Open question: Can we MODIFY what ACCENT1 means in the master? If so, all elements using that reference would update automatically.

Test: updatePageProperties or similar to change colorScheme values.

title: Fix remote execution (GCP project mismatch)
description:
itv-appscript run fails because OAuth credentials (from mit-workspace-mcp-server) don't match the GCP project the Apps Script is linked to (itv-mit-slides-formatter).

Fix path:
1. Change Apps Script linking to mit-workspace-mcp-server, OR
2. Use credentials from itv-mit-slides-formatter with separate token

Also fix: scriptProcessFilter bug in itv-appscript-deploy (Google API may have changed).

See CLAUDE.md "Known Issues" section.
